articles.description: Jio has committed over Rs 2 lakh crore for launching PAN-India 5G in several phases spread over 18 months. Jio's 5G network would be the biggest in the world, with the most advanced technology supporting it. The best thing is that Jio doesn't want to keep 5G …
articles.content: Reliance Jio, India's number one telecom operator, is going to turn six on September 5, 2022. The telco launched its 4G services on September 6, 2016. Since then, India has gone through a digital rev… [+2474 chars]

articles.title: Don't turn blind eye to these shares below Rs 100 with high PE as ten of them turn multibagger within a year! - Dalal Street Investment Journal
articles.description: A high PE ratio indicates that market participants expect high levels of earnings and growth in the future. Shares are rising faster than earnings in anticipation of improved earnings.
